org.edg.data.replication.optorsim

Class SkelResourceBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.SkelResourceBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ResourceBroker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessCostResourceBroker, CombinedCostResourceBroker, QueueLengthResourceBroker, RandomCEResourceBroker

    public abstract class SkelResourceBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceBroker
    Provides all of the functionality required by all the Resource Brokers apart from the findCE() method which must be defined by each subclass. This method returns the Computing Element to which the job must be submitted, according to the scheduling algorithm.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected SkelResourceBroker()
      This constructor should only be called from SkelResourceBroker subclasses.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract ComputingElement findCE(GridJob job, Optimisable optor)
      Returns the Computing Element to which the job must be submitted, according to the scheduling algorithm implemented by the subclass.
      void pauseRB()
      Stops the ResourceBroker from submitting any jobs until the unPauseRB() method is called.
      void run()
      The ResourceBroker maintains a queue of jobs submitted by Users which it processes until the queue is empty, then waits until more are submitted.
      void shutDownRB()
      Tell the RB that it can shut itself down after it has processed any jobs that are left.
      void submitJob(GridJob job)
      Submit a job to the RB which will decide which CE to pass it on to.
      void unPauseRB()
      Starts the ResourceBroker going again after it has been paused.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
